掠り筆: (かすりふで) - faint or blurry way of writing with a brush
掠る: (かする) - to graze/to touch lightly; to take a percentage/to exploit/to squeeze

採り込む: (とりこむ) - to take in (light, wind, etc.)
採る: (とる) - to adopt (measure, proposal); to pick (e.g. fruit)/to catch (e.g. insects)/to take (e.g. a sample); to assume (attitude); to take on (i.e. hire)/to engage
採るべき道: (とるべきみち) - course of action

採尿: (さいにょう) - urine sampling; urine collection; giving one's urine

採譜: (さいふ) - writing melody on music paper; recording a tune in musical notes

探しだす: (さがしだす) - to track down; to locate; to find out; to smoke out; to ferret out; to chase up; to discover
探しに: (さがしに) - in search of; in order to look for

探し回る: (さがしまわる) - to search about for; to hunt around for; to look high and low for; to look everywhere for
探し当てる: (さがしあてる) - to find out; to discover; to detect
探し求める: (さがしもとめる) - to search for; to seek for; to look for

探りを入れる: (さぐりをいれる) - to probe; to search; to sound out; to investigate

探り足: (さぐりあし) - feel one's way (with one's feet)
探る: (さぐる) - to feel around for/to fumble for/to grope for/to search for/to look for; to investigate/to probe into/to spy on/to sound out; to explore (parts unknown)/to enjoy (natural beauty)
